name: RoboIsland
description:
You are a young robot. You are living on a peaceful island. 

And...You want to leave it! 

But in order to do so you first have to repair the broken bridge that leads to the airport.

Gameplay:

Collect the bolts that are spread around the island and talk to the people (robots) in order to get all the equipment needed to repair the bridge!

Controls:

E = Interact/ Collect

Mouse = Looking Around

W/A/S/D = Moving Around

WaterShader from the UnityAsset Store.

All other Assets are created by me :3
